# itemHeight

**Instance Property**

The height of each item in the pop-up list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var itemHeight: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The height of items is measured in points. The default item height is `16.0` points.

## Setting Display Attributes

- **hasVerticalScroller**: A Boolean value indicating whether the combo box has a vertical scroller.
- **intercellSpacing**: The horizontal and vertical spacing between cells in the pop-up list.
- **isButtonBordered**: A Boolean value indicating whether the combo box displays a border.
- **numberOfVisibleItems**: The maximum number of visible items to display in the pop-up list at one time.
